titleStmt.title: The Married mens feast, or, The banquet at Barnet being an invitation to all those married persons who are master over their wives to a great dinner provided at Barnet on Michaelmas-day next : together with the articles to be enquired on of all those that are to be admitted to the feast, with the several dishes and dainties provided for them.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Peter Lillicrap for John Clark ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
